resources.string: By downloading and using the ORU Content Transfer app, these terms will automatically apply to you. Please make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app. Please be aware that you cannot send it on to anyone else, and you\'re not allowed to copy, or modify the app, any part of the app, or our trademarks, in any way. You\'re not allowed to attempt to extract the source code of the app, you also shouldn\'t try to translate the app or make derivative versions. The app itself, and all the trademarks, copyright, database rights and intellectual property rights related to it, still belong to ORU Content Transfer.
This app was created by ORU Content Transfer
ORU Content Transfer quickly and easily allows you to transfer the data between devices.
1.Forget the Store Wi-Fi network on this device. \n\n2.Uninstall the ORU Content Transfer app from this device.

1.Forget the Store Wi-Fi network on this device. 

2.Uninstall the ORU Content Transfer app from this device. 

3.Remember to factory reset the Old device if needed.

1.Forget the Store Wi-Fi network on this device. 

2.Uninstall the ORU Content Transfer app from this device. 

3.Remember to factory reset the Old device if needed. 

4.On Exit, when prompted, please select Messaging app as the default SMS application.

Allow ORU Content Transfer to access device settings.
(Wallpaper, Screen timeout, Brightness, Volume)
Old Device Disconnected. Continue to resume session
New Device Disconnected. Continue to resume session
Is this the Old or New device?
RESTART PAIRING \n(ONLY if instructed by Old device)
Content Transfer session has been cancelled. Please restart this session to transfer all your data from Old to New device.
Space needed: {0}, Available on New Device:
Pairing needs to be reinitiated, click on \"Restart Pairing\" on the New device.
